page.title: 10Shadow Microlight Aircraft
page.content: On Leiston's Industrial Estate stands CFM Metal fax LTD . This factory builds two seater microlight aircraft which can be used for aerial photography , crop spraying,(fire watch,) flying doctor service,police tasks and survey missions.It can be flown off floats as well.It was designed by David G.Cook who used to be the Chief Designer at Richard Garrett engineering in the town.The aircraft is made from composite materials and laminates covered with polyester fabric.The fuel used is petrol and it holds the world record for distance (545.52kms),speed(126.36kmh)and an endurance record of 5 hours 40 minutes .Its price is nine thousand pounds.It can fly at 10,000ft .
